column4: Does anybody know if FAKEraid is part of the Gutsy install package?
I was wondering about that, the alternate cd has the dmraid package?
yeah, alternate CD has support for RAIDs and LVM and stuff like that
do you know where I could find the gutsy alternate x86_84 alternate image?
Gutsy isn't released yet, but the alternate images are in the same places as the desktop images
no?  I read that somebody was downloading the gutsy alternate image a couple days ago.
that was the RC, final is being released sometime within the next 24 hours or so
Would it be bad to download the RC?  I would really like to get my server back online.
the RC will be more or less the same, some packages might change, but its no different than downloading the final in a week, and needing some upgrades to get up-to-date
I have no problem with that.
actually, at the moment you might not be able to get the RC iso, just because theyre preparing for final.  Let me look.
Just as you said that I noticed the dir was empty
http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/daily/current/gutsy-alternate-amd64.iso ought to do it for you
if you append .torrent to the end of that, you'll get the torrent, which may or may not be faster
I didn't think about that, ty again sir.
Wow the torrent was a huge improvement.  done already, ty again sir!
Its a free flash, yes.  The big announcement is it works with youtube now
